name: insatiable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of a desire or need) too great to be satisfied: insatiable appetite/desire/hunger Like so many politicians, he had an insatiable appetite/desire/hunger for power.insatiable curiosity Nothing, it seemed, would satisfy his insatiable curiosity.
